page.title: 11Fashion In Airedale 1985
page.content: Fashion in 1985 is changing rapidly. Nearly every week a new kind of fashion is displayed in leading shops such as Gossip, Miss Siam, and Tip Top. Patterns of flowers are found on skirts, trousers and blouses etc. Many children wear denim jeans, sweat shirts, or pale skirts and white socks. Most girls are wearing Jesus boots which have lots of straps, similar to Roman sandals. There are many different hair styles such as Mohican, a long stip of hair running down the middle of the head. Flashed hair has lighter streaks of hair added to their natural colour. The skinhead is very very short hair. Many girls wear earings, rings, bangles and necklaces. Girls also wear make-up like multi-coloured lipstick, eye liner and eye shadow.
